document_data.name: Arush Vayem
document_data.mainbody: '''Arush Vayem''' was a small, isolated walled village located on the frontier of [[Tymanther]] in an unmapped region of the [[Smoking Mountains]].{{Cite digital book/Brimstone Angels/Kindle|13-29}}
document_data.History: Arush Vayem was a remote village unknown to most people. It was a home for misfits, exiles and outcasts, and had a number of [[tiefling]]s among its population.
document_data.Notable Residents:
* [[Farideh]]
* [[Havilar]]
* [[Mehen]]
* [[Caisys|Caisys the Vicelord]], a [[warlock]] of the [[Toril thirteen]]
